topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5424dac76368722bcfb80000#post_5424dac76368722bcfb80000
This has been going on for like half this whole year.

Out internet this year has absolutely not been acting right and so we keep having to call out Bright house (Our internet cable and phone service) constantly.

And when ever the internet _does_ turn off lately it turns off for about either a whole 1/2 hours.

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5424dd556368723a38390100#post_5424dd556368723a38390100
Last time we called them out (Which was about like two or one month ago) Every time the internet turned off the Phone also turned off qas well.

And this happened _every_ time it rained.

What we think happened was the dumbass that came to fix something the last time forgot to put the lid back over the Internet/phone wires outside. :/

(though they did say something about our whole area was turning off, buuut I don't know if that was true)

Worst part is we couldn't put it back on because they're the only ones with a key to unlock and lock it.

Now I have no clue what it is, I hope it isn't the rain thing again cuz it's been raining a lot lately.
